Sentencas: Future electricity production will use fossil-free sources with zero CO2 emission or closed carbon cycle technologies based on renewable sources.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cells with alternative hydrogen carriers

Sentencas: While hydrogen is considered a key energy source, its production at present time relies heavily on fossil fuels.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cells with alternative hydrogen carriers

Sentencas: Furthermore, distribution and storage are not well established and require substantial investments.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cells with alternative hydrogen carriers

Sentencas: This is a strong motivation to identify alternative, safe, high power density hydrogen carriers, where existing logistics and infrastructure can be utilized.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cells with alternative hydrogen carriers

Sentencas: In this contribution, ammonia and biogas are considered for high-efficient electricity production in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cells with alternative hydrogen carriers

Sentencas: It is demonstrated that the properties and operating conditions of SOFC allow for direct use of these fuels, with fuel pretreatment inside the SOFC anode.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cells with alternative hydrogen carriers

Sentencas: The high efficient electricity production using pure ammonia or real biogas was successfully proven on state-of-the-art SOFCs.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cells with alternative hydrogen carriers

Sentencas: Even without optimization of operating parameters, electrical efficiencies of 40-50% and high and stable power output were demonstrated.
Titulo: Operation of solid oxide fuel cells with alternative hydrogen carriers
